title: NSW Southern Highlands Boutique Off-Grid Cabins & Villas with Gourmet Hamper + Welcome Drinks
description:
The Southern Highlands are calling: get off the grid and discover a new frontier of eco-luxury at this design-led hideaway, set among one of New South Wales’s most spectacular slices of bushland, just 90 minutes from Sydney. With direct access to the Penrose State Forest’s wildflower- and eucalyptus-filled trails, ARUNA Estate promises world-class walkabouts in abundance, and a shimmering infinity pool offers the perfect reason to return. Cabins are light-filled and pared-back, featuring an outdoor fire-powered bathtub - your invitation to savour an evening under the stars - or upgrade to the villa for a designer-led stay with more space to breathe and extraordinary views over the valley and the forest beyond.

With free access to ARUNA Estate’s 'guest' vegetable gardens - plus a welcome produce pack jam-packed with bottles from local winery Cherry Tree Hill, canned Curatif cocktails, gourmet meats, breads, cheeses, bacon, olives and more - you’ll never have to leave. Kick back and surrender to serenity - life doesn’t get much better than this.
offer_address: 200 Kareela Road, Penrose, New South Wales 2579, Australia
